survey_name: Gen Z Workplace Digital Collaboration Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences and satisfaction levels of Generation Z employees with digital collaboration tools used in the workplace.

questions.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you use most frequently for work-related communication?
questions.client_notes: Consider using a multi-choice format to allow respondents to select all tools they use frequently.
